name: New Project Template
description:
When I would get excited about a new idea or project I would quickly get bogged down by setting up my file. If I didn't set up my file, then I would come back to my project later and have a hard time remembering where I left of or just getting back into the flow.


I created this template to help keep on top of those first steps when the excitement and energy is ready to flow and to keep myself consistent and organized.


It's helped me, and I think it can help you too. Add pages, remove pages, etc etc. to your needs. This is just the starting point.
